author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Patrizia Immobilien: Statement Regarding Report On Suspicious Transaction From Handelsblatt‍​
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - PATRIZIA IMMOBILIEN AG:
* STATEMENT REGARDING THE REPORT ON THE SUSPICIOUS TRANSACTION FROM HANDELSBLATT‍​
* PATRIZIA IMMOBILIEN-PURCHASE OF GBW INVOLVED NO ‘RUSSIAN MONEY’,‘MONEY FROM RUSSIA’ OR SIMILAR AS REPORTED BY HANDELSBLATT/MONITOR
* WILL DEFEND OURSELVES AGAINST THESE FALSE CLAIMS WITH ALL THE LEGAL MEANS AT OUR DISPOSAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
